definition: to kick a drug habit/to abstain from drugs
to guard against/to exhort/to admonish or warn/to give up or stop doing sth/Buddhist monastic discipline/ring (for a finger)

sentences.english: Drug and non-intravenous drug users in these two lines of defense is extremely fragile.
sentences.chinese: 戒毒和不静脉注射毒品这两道防线是极其脆弱的。

sentences.english: But rather than enter rehab, she turned to her family for council, heading with her mother to her 82-year old grandmother's house.
sentences.chinese: 但她并没有进戒毒所，而是向82岁的祖母寻求帮助。

sentences.english: Article 47 The period of compulsory isolation for drug rehabilitation shall be two years.
sentences.chinese: 第四十七条强制隔离戒毒的期限为二年。

sentences.english: Day. 1725】She used to be a heroin addict, but now she is clean.
sentences.chinese: 她过去是一位海洛因毒瘾患者，但是她现在戒毒了。

sentences.english: Some local medical institutions also offer services for the rehabilitation and treatment of volunteer addicts.
sentences.chinese: 此外，一些地方在医疗单位开办戒毒脱瘾治疗业务。

sentences.english: Should strengthen the education of high-risk groups, drug rehabilitation as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 应加强对高危人群的宣教工作，及早戒毒。

sentences.english: Objective To know the mental status of the persons of voluntarily stopping drugs.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解自愿戒毒者脱毒后的心理状况。

sentences.english: Winehouse, 24, returned to public performance for the first time since she entered rehab.
sentences.chinese: 24岁的怀恩豪斯戒毒之后首次公开演出。

sentences.english: It was four days of me sitting in resuscitation hoping and praying I wasn't dying.
sentences.chinese: 于是我坐在戒毒所里度过了四天，祈祷我能够活下来。

sentences.english: From out of the drug, they were 3 of often together.
sentences.chinese: 从戒毒所出来后，他们3人经常聚在一起。

sentences.english: Reid died trying to kick his habit in a sanitarium.
sentences.chinese: 这是戒毒前期，里德在疗养所试图戒毒时死去。

sentences.english: Reid died trying to kick his habit in a sanitarium.
sentences.chinese: 这是戒毒前期，里德在疗养所试图戒毒时死去。

sentences.english: Patients will be treated, and will be sent to compulsory treatment of drug addicts.
sentences.chinese: 患病者将被收治，而吸毒者将被送强制戒毒。

sentences.english: I met Lily yeasterday, and she told that Tom's in drug rehabilitation.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天跟莉莉见面了，她说汤姆正在戒毒。

definition: to resume smoking (after giving up)/to relapse into smoking or drug abuse
to give up drinking/to abstain from drinking
to quit/to give up (a bad habit)
